skills.name: Solidity Basics
skills.pattern: contract Token { mapping(address => uint) balances; function transfer(address to, uint amount) public {} }

skills.name: ERC-20 Token
skills.pattern: function transfer(address to, uint256 amount) returns (bool); event Transfer(address from, address to, uint256 value)

skills.name: ERC-721 NFT
skills.pattern: function ownerOf(uint256 tokenId) returns (address); function safeTransferFrom(from, to, tokenId)

skills.name: Gas Optimization
skills.pattern: Pack storage, use calldata, avoid loops, batch operations

skills.name: Reentrancy Guard
skills.pattern: modifier nonReentrant { require(!locked); locked = true; _; locked = false; }

skills.name: Upgradeable Contracts
skills.pattern: TransparentUpgradeableProxy, UUPS, delegatecall to implementation

skills.name: Hardhat
skills.pattern: npx hardhat compile; npx hardhat test; npx hardhat deploy --network mainnet

skills.name: Foundry
skills.pattern: forge build; forge test; forge script Deploy.s.sol --broadcast

skills.name: Ethers.js
skills.pattern: const contract = new ethers.Contract(addr, abi, signer); await contract.transfer(to, amount)

skills.name: Viem
skills.pattern: const hash = await walletClient.writeContract({address, abi, functionName, args})

skills.name: Wagmi
skills.pattern: const {data, write} = useContractWrite({address, abi, functionName})

skills.name: AMM Basics
skills.pattern: x * y = k constant product formula (Uniswap)

skills.name: Lending Protocols
skills.pattern: Supply collateral, borrow assets, liquidation thresholds

skills.name: Flash Loans
skills.pattern: Borrow, use, repay in single transaction, arbitrage

skills.name: Yield Farming
skills.pattern: Provide liquidity, earn LP tokens + rewards

skills.name: Audit Checklist
skills.pattern: Reentrancy, overflow, access control, oracle manipulation, front-running

skills.name: Slither
skills.pattern: slither . --print human-summary

skills.name: Fuzzing
skills.pattern: function testFuzz_transfer(uint256 amount) public { vm.assume(amount <= balance); }

skills.name: Optimistic Rollups
skills.pattern: Fraud proofs, 7 day withdrawal, EVM compatible

skills.name: ZK Rollups
skills.pattern: Validity proofs, instant finality, higher compression

skills.name: IPFS
skills.pattern: ipfs.add(file); CID content addressing

skills.name: Arweave
skills.pattern: Pay once, store forever, permaweb

skills.name: The Graph
skills.pattern: Subgraph: schema.graphql, mapping.ts, subgraph.yaml

skills.name: Event Listening
skills.pattern: contract.on('Transfer', (from, to, amount) => {})

skills.name: WalletConnect
skills.pattern: Web3Modal, multiple wallet support

skills.name: Account Abstraction
skills.pattern: Smart contract wallets, gasless transactions, social recovery

skills.name: Chainlink
skills.pattern: AggregatorV3Interface(addr).latestRoundData() returns price

skills.name: VRF
skills.pattern: Chainlink VRF for provably fair random numbers

skills.name: DAO Basics
skills.pattern: Token voting, proposals, timelock, quorum

skills.name: Governor Contract
skills.pattern: propose(), castVote(), queue(), execute()
